text: Edmond Fayçal Tapsoba (born 2 February 1999) is a Burkinabé professional footballer who plays as a centre back for German club Bayer Leverkusen and the Burkina Faso national team. ==Club career== Born in Ouagadougou, Tapsoba played for Salitas, US Ouagadougou, Leixões, Vitória de Guimarães B, and Vitória de Guimarães. On 31 January 2020, he agreed to a five-and-a-half-year contract with Bayer Leverkusen for a fee of €18 million + €7 million for objectives. ==International career== Tapsoba made his international debut for Burkina Faso in 2016. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:Association football defenders Category:Burkinabé footballers Category:Burkina Faso international footballers Category:Salimata et Taséré FC players Category:US Ouagadougou players Category:Leixões S.C. players Category:Vitória S.C. players Category:Bayer 04 Leverkusen players Category:Primeira Liga players Category:LigaPro players Category:Bundesliga players] Category:Burkinabé expatriate footballers Category:Burkinabé expatriate sportspeople in Portugal Category:Expatriate footballers in Portugal Category:Burkinabé expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany ]
title: Edmond Tapsoba
